mapper.insert: insert into tbl_question(question_title, question_content, status, member_id, category_id, created_date, updated_date) values (#{questionTitle}, #{questionContent}, #{status}, #{memberId}, #{categoryId}, now(), now())
insert into tbl_file(file_name, file_path, question_id, created_date, updated_date) values (#{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{id}, now(), now())
